job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer (Go)

The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software engineering with Go, emphasizing product features, API development, and data ingestion services. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, making it irrelevant to the GenAI or ML Engineer profiles.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and maintenance of the server-side logic and infrastructure of software applications, which is a core component of traditional software development.
This indicates the engineer's responsibility for building and implementing functionalities that users will interact with or benefit from in a product, a key aspect of software development.

This explicitly mentions the creation of Application Programming Interfaces for the backend, a fundamental task in software engineering for enabling communication between different software components.
This phrase describes the process of gathering data from various sources and bringing it into a system for processing or storage, which falls under the umbrella of data engineering.
This highlights a practical and results-oriented approach to problem-solving and task execution, aligning with the definition of pragmatism.
This suggests an environment that values open communication and collaboration, where team members feel empowered to contribute their ideas.

job_tasks.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions
job_tasks.justification: This indicates an opportunity for proactive contribution, initiative-taking, and shaping the direction of projects, aligning with innovation and ownership.
The mention of rapid scaling implies a dynamic environment where the engineer will need to adapt to new challenges and potentially evolving technologies or processes.

soft_skills.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions
